subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong declared it a “major victory” Sunday that the I.O.C. officially scolded Dick Pound, chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, for comments that might have damaged Armstrong’s reputation.
snippet: Lance Armstrong declared it a “major victory” Sunday that the I.O.C. officially scolded Dick Pound, chairman of the World Anti-Doping Agency, for comments that might have damaged Armstrong’s reputation.
